title: Biden's Bill CANNOT Pass | Guests: Ken Paxton & Nic McKinley | 10/20/21
description:
The Biden administration claims it's scaling back on the bank account monitoring, but this isn't about your bank account. Glenn explains the steps of modern monetary theory and how it’s right in line with what the Biden administration is doing. Texas Attorney General Ken Paxton joins to discuss the immigration crisis at the border and vaccine mandates in Texas. Rachel Bovard, senior policy director for Conservative Partnership, joins to discuss the race toward artificial intelligence and Google being an unreliable ally. Nic McKinley, founder and executive director of DeliverFund, joins Glenn to discuss the Afghan rescue mission — and how the rescue missions aren't over.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
